publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-211 Maureen Macmillan: Parliament's In-house Mail Servicesâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement that its in-house mail service will be transferred to the responsibility of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body and congratulates all members of the Royal Mail staff for the professional service provided to MSPs and staff since 1999. Supported by: Colin Fox*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Janis Hughes*, Irene Oldfather*, Margaret Jamieson*, Helen Eadie*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-211 Parliament's In-house Mail Services (lodged on 27 June 2003) Bill Butler*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-211 Parliament's In-house Mail Services (lodged on 27 June 2003) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-211 Parliament's In-house Mail Services (lodged on 27 June 2003) Brian Adam*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-211 Parliament's In-house Mail Services (lodged on 27 June 2003) Elaine Smith*
